message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $80 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $105.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $105, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $92.50. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
